fields.name: The Rooted Deck
fields.description: The Rooted Deck is a nature-woven oracle, carrying the quiet wisdom of trees — guardians of strength, resilience, and deep connection. Each card offers a tree’s story as a gentle mirror, inviting reflection, healing, and personal growth. In the patient rhythm of roots and branches, The Rooted Deck reminds us that resilience is a quiet beauty and growth is a lifelong journey.
